first_para: Joseph Edmund "Jo" Johnson (born 23 December 1971) is a Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Orpington since the general election in May 2010. Since April 2013, he has been the Head of the Number 10 Policy Unit and a junior Cabinet Office minister.

full.extract: Joseph Edmund "Jo" Johnson (born 23 December 1971) is a Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Orpington since the general election in May 2010. Since April 2013, he has been the Head of the Number 10 Policy Unit and a junior Cabinet Office minister.
full.title: Jo Johnson
